title: Paging Mr. Carter
author: VD
content_html:
I had to add The Evangelical Outpost to the Faves when I realized that I was reading it more often than most of my other so-called favorites. If you haven’t read it already, check it out. It’s well-written and thoughtful, far more than just a random religious site. It’s also rather more respectable than this erratic little corner of the Internet; at least someone is upholding civilized standards somewhere around here.

As my executive producer in the game industry once said to me: “I’m not entirely sure that we’re on the side of civilization here.”
